level.heading: Distributions in kind.
level.text: A partner shall have no right to receive, and shall not be required to accept, a distribution in kind.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on § 402 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See Vol. 6, Part I , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
